title: Ep 9: Advice. Alllll the Career Questions, Becca's an Introverted Extrovert, & Grace Can't Stop Talking About Body Wash.
itunes:title: Ep 9: Advice. Alllll the Career Questions, Becca's an Introverted Extrovert, & Grace Can't Stop Talking About Body Wash.
description:
In this advice ep, we're talking all things career. We've gotten a ton of questions around changing career paths and we answer that today (spoiler: We say, go for it!) We also talk about being your own advocate, and the fact that it's totally normal not to know what you want to do. Also, Grace's thoughts on Glossier (+shower gel obsession), and Becca's introverted extrovert struggles.

Join us next week for our next book club to discuss Famous in Love!

In the meantime, loving Bad on Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
content:encoded:

We also talk about being your own advocate, and the fact that it's totally normal not to know what you want to do. Also, Grace's thoughts on Glossier (+shower gel obsession), and Becca's introverted extrovert struggles.

itunes:subtitle: All things career related from making a big change to being your own advocate.
itunes:author: Grace Atwood & Becca Freeman
